Title: Series: Library of Ashurbanipal
Description: Part of a clay prism, annals of Ashurbanipal, describes restorations to Esagila, variant form of text, campaign against Tirhakah of Egypt, 15 + 9 lines of inscription, Neo-Assyrian.
Bibliographic references: Lambert & Millard 1968a / Catalogue of the cuneiform tablets in the Kouyunjik Collection of the British Museum: Second Supplement
